name: Reality (itch) (Owen6936)
description:
First person 3D + 2D Puzzle + Point & Click
I don't know how to describe this.

You are guy who work in game company.
He need work from home due to the spreading of virus.
His job is debug some game file before sleeping.

And after he finish his works, he will get pay.
That's what it should be.
Until he realize something...

This game has exclusively use W A S D + LMB  as main control.

Game by:  Owen6936
Made for : Global game jam 2022
